title: Era molto meglio l'assetto precedente : più ordinato e immediatamente visibile. Così è una fatica aprire la posta degli account presenti.
content: Questo nuovo assetto di thunderbird é farraginoso, disrdinato e rende molto difficoltoso, per chi ha vari account, ricercare e leggere i messaggi e tutte le altre cartelle. Era molto migliore prima.
creator: liliumhelios

title: Recipient mail adresse autocompletion/proposition without adressbook
content:
Hello there, I'm using/testing Thunderbird for Android since few month now. I'm very happy with it, i come from BlueMail which is already great but I was not happy with the efficiency of the push notification system. I was missing a lot of emails. Anyway, i decided to try Thunderbird and it solved all my problems.

But, I have a blocking problem using Thunderbird for Android : When I write a new email and I write the adress mail of the recipient(s), the app doesnt propose any autocompletion/email adress based on emails i recieved/sent. The only way to have this is to have contacts in my adress book which I don't want. This is a feature BlueMail had so I uess it should be possible to have such equivalent with thunderbird ? Does anyone knows ?

Thanks a lot :) Best, N
creator: nyckslyder

title: lost access to my Google calendar
content: This morning, I discovered that I can no longer add items to my Google calendar and that any new items added on my phone did not sync. I tried uninstalling the Google Provider addon and then tried to resinstall it. However, I'm getting "Bad Gateway" error for the addons site. Having read a couple of articles I then tried to add my Google calendar as a network calendar and Google accepted the request but Thunderbird reports that my "credentials were not accepted" - despite the fact the Google sent me an email saying that Thunderbird now had full access to my calendar. Do I need the "Provider" addon? If so, where do I get it and why did it stop working?
creator: stephenatkins7215

title: Get mail only downloads in batches
content:
Hi, I am using the latest version of Thunderbird, connected to three Gmail accounts (two are POP3, one is IMAP). I usually load up thunderbird once a week to backup all emails from Gmail. The problem is when I click the get new mail button it only downloads emails in batches of 14 or 20. I have to keep clicking the get new mail button to download all the weeks emails. I cannot find any setting to change this behaviour. I just want thunderbird to download all emails in one go. Is this a Gmail issue or thunderbird issue? Thanks in advance

James
creator: jhansonnz

title: How I remove the reply button when viewing newsgroups
content:
It is annoying as when I reply to a Newsgroup I instinctively hit reply rather than Followup. It also happens to be the first button in the list compounding the issue. Thankfully my default newsgroup email address is invalid so my reply doesn't go to the victims email account.

Some years ago I managed to remove this button, presumably with an Addon that no longer works. Are there any Addons that still work?

Due to issues with Thunderbird and starting in troubleshoot mode this has undone the removal of this button.

Can anyone give me a clue how I can remove this troublesome button?
creator: thunderbird2

title: Problem with connection
content:
I have an intriguing problem. I am using the latest version, currently 128.8.1 (automatic update), Windows 11 is also updated. Desktop computer, Ethernet connection, network speed 900mbps.

I use 10 accounts in the program, most of the time the program connects only to gmail accounts, and IMAP accounts from other providers are constantly being connected. Sometimes hours pass until a new message appears in the program (there is no message download, simply, the other accounts are as if without updates). Messages can be sent, but a network error message appears, informing that the message has been sent but not saved.

I know that the mail arrives because I use a different device, I only have the problem on this equipment.

Drivers are up to date, Thunderbird reinstalled, started in maintenance mode, database re-indexed. Nothing helps.

Any ideas? Thanks!
creator: podhalanin

title: impossibilità di aggiungere evento su calendario google sincronizzato
content: Buongiorno, da stamattina il comando "aggiungi evento" non è accessibile e non è possibile aggiungere nessun evento. Inoltre, non riesco più a sincronizzare il calendario google, anche dopo aver annullato e rimosso la sottoscrizione e rifacendo la procedura di sottocrizione e collegamento nuovamente. Ho effettuato tutti gli aggiornamenti disponibili ad oggi. Vi prego di potermi dare un supporto in merito. Grazie mille. Saluti Omar

title: E-mail not working
content:
When I sign it to Thunderbird, and click on an incoming e-mail the "From" line shows it came from me with my name and email address. The body of the e-mail is outlined in RED. When I click on anything in the body of the email, that box brings up little squares around it as I was going to change the box. When I click on it a box come on where I am supposed to choose a link. I have no idea what that means and I can never get to the information in the e-mail

I need to talk to a "REAL" person not a return e-mail. I have a new computer that Best By transferred my files from my old compute to this new computer Evidently in the process the Settings got messed up. My e-mail is useless and I'm missing information I need.

HELP!!!!!! Wayne Haver

title: agenda in Thunderbird werkt niet meer met G-mail agenda's sinds deze morgen na de system maintenance.
content:
Sinds deze morgen kan ik in de agenda van Thunderbird geen aanpassingen meer doen aan bestaande agenda-gebeurtenissen of geen nieuwe gebeurtenissen meer toevoegen voor zover dit g-mail agenda's betreft. Blijkbaar werkt de synchronisatie met G-mail agenda niet meer. Wanneer je een nieuwe gebeurtenis wil aanmaken, kan je ook nog maar enkel de agenda "algemeen" selecteren. De andere worden niet meer getoond.

Ik had hiervan een screenfilmpje gemaakt maar dat kan ik niet toevoegen want is .mp4 wat niet kan ge-upload worden.
creator: erik.wuyts
